title: Secret Video Recorder Pro v7.5.Full
description:
Requirements: 2.1 and up

Overview: Secret Video Recorder. No sound, preview. 1-touch operation. High quality 

video. Secret Video Recorder. No sound. No preview. One touch recording. High 

quality 

videos. Turn screen off and continue recording. Make and receive phone calls during 

recording.

Secret Video Recorder is the ONLY hidden camera app in the market that does 

background recording so you can use your phone as normal and NO ONE can tell you 

are recording video.

Features:

1. One touch operation for recording start and stop

2. Full HD video (1920x1080) recording

3. Disable Notification icon so there is no screen indication that video is 

recording

4. Auto split video files so you can record up to all available space on SD card

5. Choose internal or external SD card for storing videos

6. Supports front and back camera

7. Very few permissions needed so privacy is assured

Additional Features:

1. On supported devices, start recording by long press of the search button

2. Talk on the phone while video recording continues in background

3. Turn screen off and continue recording (on supported devices only). Saves 

battery and allows long recordings

Uses:

1. Professional hidden camera

2. CCTV and security video recording

3. Surveillance camera

4. HD video recorder for Android

5. Background video recorder

6. Secret spy camera

7. Mobile hidden camera for Android
